arts.sum: Manchester City responded well to back-to-back defeats when they faced fierce rivals Manchester United on Sunday, with Erling Haaland's brace inspiring the Citizens to a 3-0 home victory. Pep Guardiol...

arts.ttl: “I wasn’t feeling well” – Napoli player dismisses concerns about availability against Manchester City, is fired up to feature
arts.sum: On Tuesday, La Repubblica expressed doubts about Napoli defender Sam Beukema’s availability against Manchester City in their Champions League clash on Thursday. The newspaper noted that the Dutchman is suffering from a bout of flu and alongside Alex Meret, there are uncertainties about his presence on Thursday. arts.ttl: ‘Well and training’ – Napoli player now in fray to feature against Manchester City after injury scare
arts.sum: This week, there have been major doubts about whether Napoli goalkeeper Alex Meret will be fit enough to feature against Manchester City in their Champions League game at the Etihad Stadium on Thursday. The 28-year-old pulled out of Napoli’s weekend clash against Fiorentina, leaving summer signing Vanja Milinković-Savić to make his debut. arts.ttl: ‘The boy of truth’ – Craze growing about Rasmus Højlund ahead of Napoli’s Manchester City clash
arts.sum: Rasmus Højlund joined Napoli on an initial loan deal from Manchester United in the summer and scored on his debut for the Italian giants against Fiorentina. Antonio Conte’s side are now preparing to take on Manchester City in their UEFA Champions League opener on Thursday.
